reviewText: My grandson just loves this DVD. He is autistic and he learned to say bug, bug. He carries the empty cover around.
Super cute and kept my niece entertained.  She has learned quite a bit watching Word World, which is both fun and educational.  I will definitely be purchasing more of these for her!
These are fun and educational videos that your little ones will love to watch. I recommend these to anyone! They are a great buy!
I gave this DVD to my 5 years old son for Christmas and he loves it! We are french and It's a good way to teach him english, even if there is no subtitle.

My son is a HUGE fan of Word World, and after going on a two week cruise where we watched the same two Word World DVDs over and over and over and over (you get the picture), I came home determined to buy the rest of the DVDs just so I could have some variety.  Boppin' with  the Bug Band is my favorite out of the bunch that I bought upon our return.  The songs are cute, the story lines are wonderful for shows geared at the preschool set, and so far, my husband and I enjoy the shows nearly as much as our son.

In addition to the vibrant colors, funny characters and cute songs, the Word World series was developed in cooperation with an Early Literacy program.  It definitely does its job.  My son, at 18 months, is able to identify by sight half of the letters of the alphabet.  While that is not entirely due to his obsession with Word World, most of the letters he identifies are those featured in Word World episodes.  I would recommend this series, and specifically Boppin' with the Bug Band, to any parent of preschoolers who is looking for something their children can watch that is fun AND beneficial.

My daughter is a big fan of Wordworld and she loves this DVD.  It's educational, entertaining and even I enjoy watching it!  I love the short episodes, it keeps her entertained when we need a little downtime.  I love how they spell the words and the songs are catchy!
This is so-o-o-o  cute.  Word World is such a brilliant idea for exposing infants and toddlers to letters, speech, and vocabulary.  All the stories are heart-warming and good lessons in life.
Very educational dvd love all of them
Our granddaughter absolutely loves Big Bugs Band, but we couldn't find it anywhere...so, we got this instead. It's pretty decent, our granddaughter likes it and it wasn't overly pricey.

My 3 year old granddaughter LOVES "Word World". I don't mind watching with her and I even know the little "Let's Build It" jingle by heart now! I've collected several of the DVD's  for her., This is one of her favorites.
Disc skipped so much it was impossible to watch.
My daughter loves this DVD, it's such a great learning resource
Fun interactive DVD for my 2 yr old twins
I highly recommend word world for any one with children learning to talk, read or put words together! The cartoons are adorable and really teach your kids alot!!

My 3-year-old twin nephews love WordWorld, and they both love music. Not only do they learn about words with the awesome WordWorld videos, with this one's focus on music they love boppin' to the beat, too!
Our 2 1/2 year old grandson loves these videos and so do we!  They are fun to watch and they introduce the concept that letters make words in a very creative manner.
